duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead cross-functional teams to design and deliver transformational solutions that can scale across the business.
Develop strong partnerships with every team, leveraging data in all approaches.
Coach and develop cross-functional teams while continuously raising the bar on delivery excellence.
Identify obstacles and roadblocks, and proactively develop approaches to overcome them.
Perform quantitative and qualitative analyses and leverage change management best practices to mitigate resistance.
Collaborate with business unit and technology leaders to execute ambitious transformational strategy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience.
Experience in consulting, developing strategy, and/or change management.
Degree in engineering, business or an MBA or advanced degree preferred.
Experience in management consulting from a top-tier consulting firm is a plus.
